reviewText: It's Ringo what can you say.  His classic songs.  Plays well, good price and fast shipping
Any of his dvd's are great.

Ehhhhhh, it's Ringo. Something about Ringo being a front man that doesn't fit for me, he belongs behind a drum kit. Suppose the arthritis has set in, back aches, it happens as drummers get older,..didn't to Buddy Rich his wrists were as strong as concrete and flexible as silly putty.

A fun show, does all the hits...
Backed up by long time Ringo producer
Mark Hudson and a very solid band.
This is a just a great experience.
Leaves you feeling upbeat
with a smile on your face...
VERY INTERRESTING DVD WITH PLENTY OF SONG BY RINGO STARR AND HIS ALL STARR BAND . GOOD SCENE AND RINGO SEEMS VERY SYMPATHETIC !
This was not one of his best performances but it will probably satisfy his dieheart fans and hopefully in the future he will redeem himself.

John was hard core, Paul was romantic, George the mystic, and Ringo is still just a neat happy guy. My impression is the others would be hard to know but Ringo would be fun to hang out with. Not so munch into this music as I was the Beatles but just to see Ringo solo was worth it!!

I was anxious to view and listen to Ringo and the Roundheads concert.  But to my disappointment, the dvd was defective!  The intro was great, it had sound and video, but the concert segment only had video, no sound.

Amazon was great about refunding my money, but I really wanted to see and hear the concert. This was the first time that I bought a dvd that arrived defective. Lucky for me, I had ordered another Ringo and the All-Stars and that was great.
